summary: This is a law enforcement 'Person of Interest Worksheet' for Michael Albert Thomas, prepared by IA Mallory Rosso. It compiles identifying information, addresses, contact details, vehicle information, and results of database checks (criminal, civil, financial) as part of an investigation (Case 90A-NY-3151227). The document notes a prior domestic incident where Thomas was listed as a victim.

connections.description: Were in a relationship and had an argument over custody in December 2014, resulting in a domestic incident report where Thomas was listed as the victim.
Both names appear on a joint Chapter 7 bankruptcy filing in Kentucky, though the SSN did not match the subject of this worksheet, making the connection uncertain.
SA Amanda Moore is the case agent for the investigation in which Michael Thomas is a person of interest.
IA Mallory Rosso prepared the investigative worksheet on person of interest Michael Thomas.

events.title: Domestic Incident Involving Michael Thomas
events.description: An argument over custody between Michael Thomas and his girlfriend, Monique Faare, was reported to the NYPD. Thomas was listed as the victim in incident #5064637.

events.title: Joint Bankruptcy Filing in Kentucky
events.description: A joint Chapter 7 bankruptcy filing was made by a Michael Thomas and Ashley M Thomas in Kentucky. The SSN associated with the filing did not match the subject of this worksheet.

keyFacts: Michael Albert Thomas is the subject of a law enforcement 'Person of Interest Worksheet' for Case 90A-NY-3151227, led by SA Amanda Moore.
Thomas was listed as the victim in a 2014 NYPD domestic incident (#5064637) involving an argument over custody with his girlfriend, Monique Faare.
Database checks showed no criminal history for Thomas in eJustice or NYPD databases, but he was associated with over 20 New Jersey civil court filings.
A joint bankruptcy filing from Kentucky in 2019 with an Ashley M Thomas was flagged, but the SSN did not match Thomas's records, indicating a possible name match only.

The document compiles extensive personal details on Thomas, including addresses, phone numbers, email, a vehicle (2016 Nissan Maxima), and results from multiple law enforcement and commercial databases.
